ygData.subject: Zimel's Blades Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello All ! I got the recipe for the bog juice you all are searching for :) - Bottle - Water flask - Snakeskin Combine all in a brew barrel and you get bog
ygData.messageBody:
Hello All !

I got the recipe for the bog juice you all are searching for :)

- Bottle
- Water flask
- Snakeskin

Combine all in a brew barrel and you get bog juice. I dont know what skill you need or if there is a exact position of the parts in the brew barrel ( A friend of mine who is very good in brewing made the bog juice for me =)

Now I have another problem. I cannot get the blanket by myself because the innkeeper in seafarer roost dont sell to me ( He glowers at me doubious. I can get only one bottle a day from the woman and I dont know how to give tykar 4 Droms. Me and a friend tried to get the blanket in that way that he bought the drom, gave it to me and I gave it to tykar. But I am not able to do this 4 times ( Any suggestion how to get the blanket ?

Sir Utrellien
16th Paladin of Deepwater Knights from Erudin
Innoruuk Server
